pages.text: $(l)How to get the brochure?$()$(br2)In $(#FF9900)Creative Mode$(), you can simply find it in the 'Neko Tools' tab.$(br)As for $(#9900FF)Survival Mode$(), you can try trading with a $(#5570FF)Novice Librarian$() villager, and this brochure might appear as an option among the offers, you can then exchange a book and some $(#00FF66)Emeralds$() for it.
